name: ci-state-indicator
description: Continuous integration system state indicator (also knowns as Traffic light)

scripts.start: cd frontend && npm run-script build && cd ../backend && npm run-script start
scripts.postinstall: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.buildbinary: cd frontend && npm run-script build && cd .. && pkg backend/bin/www -c package.json
